body:
Some of them are legitimate, but others are in upstream library headers from qt (`5.12.1-1.fc30`)

The version of gcc I was using:

```
$ gcc --version
gcc (GCC) 9.0.1 20190312 (Red Hat 9.0.1-0.10)
Copyright (C) 2019 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
```
There has been a recent fixup (https://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/commit/482bd38ed8984aad9b1560405e7b3d775c194ccd). The date suggests that this was fixed in the version of gcc I was using, but the warnings are still printed.

Some example warnings:

```
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h: In member function Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionGroupBox& QStyleOptionGroupBox::operator=(const QStyleOptionGroupBox&)Ã¢ÂÂ:
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h:626:24: warning: implicitly-declared Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionComplex& QStyleOptionComplex::operator=(const QStyleOptionComplex&)Ã¢ÂÂ is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-copy]
  626 | class Q_WIDGETS_EXPORT QStyleOptionGroupBox : public QStyleOptionComplex
      |                        ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h:510:5: note: because Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionComplexÃ¢ÂÂ has user-provided Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionComplex::QStyleOptionComplex(const QStyleOptionComplex&)Ã¢ÂÂ
  510 |     QStyleOptionComplex(const QStyleOptionComplex &other) : QStyleOption(Version, Type) { *this = other; }
      |     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h: In copy constructor Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionGroupBox::QStyleOptionGroupBox(const QStyleOptionGroupBox&)Ã¢ÂÂ:
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h:640:108: note: synthesized method Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionGroupBox& QStyleOptionGroupBox::operator=(const QStyleOptionGroupBox&)Ã¢ÂÂ first required here
  640 |     QStyleOptionGroupBox(const QStyleOptionGroupBox &other) : QStyleOptionComplex(Version, Type) { *this = other; }
      |                                                                                                            ^~~~~
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h: In copy constructor Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionSizeGrip::QStyleOptionSizeGrip(const QStyleOptionSizeGrip&)Ã¢ÂÂ:
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h:654:108: warning: implicitly-declared Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionSizeGrip& QStyleOptionSizeGrip::operator=(const QStyleOptionSizeGrip&)Ã¢ÂÂ is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-copy]
  654 |     QStyleOptionSizeGrip(const QStyleOptionSizeGrip &other) : QStyleOptionComplex(Version, Type) { *this = other; }
      |                                                                                                            ^~~~~
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h:654:5: note: because Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionSizeGripÃ¢ÂÂ has user-provided Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionSizeGrip::QStyleOptionSizeGrip(const QStyleOptionSizeGrip&)Ã¢ÂÂ
  654 |     QStyleOptionSizeGrip(const QStyleOptionSizeGrip &other) : QStyleOptionComplex(Version, Type) { *this = other; }
      |     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h: In member function Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionSizeGrip& QStyleOptionSizeGrip::operator=(const QStyleOptionSizeGrip&)Ã¢ÂÂ:
/usr/include/qt5/QtWidgets/qstyleoption.h:645:24: warning: implicitly-declared Ã¢ÂÂQStyleOptionComplex& QStyleOptionComplex::operator=(const QStyleOptionComplex&)Ã¢ÂÂ is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-copy]
  645 | class Q_WIDGETS_EXPORT QStyleOptionSizeGrip : public QStyleOptionComplex
      |                        ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
...
title: gui: Building with gcc 9 prints a trillion warnings (-Wdeprecated-copy)
